Detailed Description

The ActionDropDownWidget includes a title, a subtitle, an arrow and contents.

When click it, it will show ListWidget for content

The following is an simple example for ActionDropDownWidget.

 ActionDropDownWidget* mpDropDown = new ActionDropDownWidget(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 mpDropDown->setTitle("Hello");
 mpDropDown->setSubtitle("happy");

 StringArray items(3);
 items.replaceAt(String("item 1"), 0);
 items.replaceAt(String("item 2"), 1);
 items.replaceAt(String("item 3"), 2);

 mpDropDown->setItemListArray(items);
